title: 820-3023 no chime
message: board no liquid damage if i unplug flat cable board startup correctly chime and display just slow and fan full speed (good dc board et flat cable know, real charger),  how to proceded ?

title: 820-3023 no chime
message: unplug what flat cable? You can't have chime if the IO board cable is unplugged....

title: 820-3023 no chime
message: If flat cable connected i’ve only black screen no boot no display

title: 820-3023 no chime
message: So are you saying it turns on without the I/O cable plugged in? If so did you try a known good flat cable? Also inspect J4700 for any burned pins if so as well as the connector on the DC-in board.

title: 820-3023 no chime
message:
turns on with display without flat cable connected, J4700 and dc-in board looks very clean

noticed : if i unplug and replug flat cable board will start correctly and if i shutdown and restart, board black screen no shime

However dc-in board et cable work very good another laptop

​​​​​​​without flat-cable board will boot corretly all time but cable good and dc-in good i don't understant why

title: 820-3023 no chime
message: Is this the DC in board and cable meant for this machine? Airs of different years use different dc in boards and different cables.

title: 820-3023 no chime
message: Yeah, check part numbers on the IO board and flat cable.
